thread.title: WH Cautious On Claim That Trump Team Info Was 'Incidentally Collected'
thread.title_full: WH Cautious On Claim That Trump Team Info Was 'Incidentally Collected'

author: Matt Shuham
title: WH Cautious On Claim That Trump Team Info Was 'Incidentally Collected'

organizations.name: trump team info was 'incidentally collected' white house

text:
White House press secretary Sean Spicer mostly avoided discussing a claim from the chair of the House Intelligence Committee that information on President Donald Trump and members of transition team was “incidentally collected” during an investigation unrelated to Russian interference in the election.
Read More →
